QuestData.Title: Bushwhacker
QuestData.Description: Kaz is using us, I am sure of it. She is a Laughing Skull and must NOT be trusted.$b$bFor now, I am willing to play along until we can learn more. $b$bKaz is going to ask for you to travel to Evermorn Springs. When there, I recommend you slay any botani you encounter.$b$bCulling the numbers of these horrific casters will hopefully save future orcs from such a infested fate.$b$bI will stay with Kaz and keep a close eye on her.
QuestData.RewardText: I had thought the Laughing Skull were planning something. Now I think I am beginning to understand.$b$bThey match savagery with savagery.
